title: Witch Party
desc:
Post 2446
*Bring Your Own Arcana.*
- Instead of a 1/3 chance when anyone draws cards for it to be a Basic one, it is a 1/3 chance to draw an <:arcana:1141474382905094215>.
- <:arcana:1141474382905094215> s must be played.
- Both these effects remain in play for the rest of the game.
- If in play, any effect that makes Basic cards unable to be drawn is removed. Including modifiers!
